description:
Halston Z-14 is a celebration of timeless elegance and bold masculinity. With key notes from the original scent and an updated overall structure, the fragrance is a contemporary expression of the brand that remains true to the spirit of Halston.
Halston Z-14 is sensual, sophisticated, warm, masculine, and sexy. It was created for the man who lives with comfort and ease. The fragrance was designed to be distinctive, yet easily recognizable in character.

The fragrance has a special, fresh top note derived from a variety of crisp accords found in fresh bergamot, zesty verbena and fresh cut basil.
The heart races with intoxicating nuances of cinnamon bark, herbaceous tarragon, hints of nutmeg wrapped in subtle carnation.
A very unusual spicy drydown of deep sandalwood, wet tree moss add depth, while sexy patchouli, golden amber and a touch of vanilla bean leave a sensual trail.

description:
Step up your game with Tapout men’s body sprays. Perfect for getting you ready for the day, after a workout, or when you need to smell your best. These best in class men’s body sprays work as hard as you do and their distinct scent will have you ready for any challenge. Defy the odds with this fresh, clean scent. The top delivers long-lasting freshness from a tonic accord built with Mandarin, Watery Notes, and Ginger. The heart is shaded in velvety green. description:
Dolce & Gabbana Intenso is pure instinct; the power of an emotion that is freely expressed. It is the force of a determined man, with a heart that is rooted in tradition, yet revels in the modern world. Dolce & Gabbana Intenso is a woody aromatic fragrance, whose profound appeal is defined by a brand new discovery in the olfactory world: the Moepel accord which has been re-created from the flowers and leaves of the Milkwood tree.
Top Notes: Intenso opens with luminous Aquatic notes and green accents of Basil. This fresh feeling is completed with notes of Marigold and Geranium.
Middle Notes: First come the notes of lavender and then the tobacco masculinity is further defined with soft dry notes from Absolutes of Hay and Bran.
Bottom Notes: Luxurious floral, balsamic, and honey accents. Intensity and strength come from the profound combination Labdanum, Sandalwood and Cypress. A contrast of fresh, warm and rich, that completes the composition of the fragrance and emphasizes its woody charm.
title: D&G Intenso by Dolce & Gabbana Eau de Parfum Men's Cologne - 2.5 fl oz
